item.title: Hunting PrivateLoader: The malware behind InstallsKey PPI service
item.description: This widespread malware had some important updates recently and has been infecting 5000 systems daily.

item.title: Data Insights on AgentTesla and OriginLogger Victims
item.description: AgentTesla remains a prevalent commodity stealer, mainly distributed via email attachments.

item.title: Tofsee Botnet: Proxying and Mining
item.description: An overview of current activities of the Tofsee botnet.

item.title: Unpacking Colibri Loader: A Russian APT linked Campaign
item.description: Unpacking of a recent ColibriLoader campaign along with some YARA rules to detect it.

item.title: Tracking PrivateLoader: Malware Distribution Service
item.description: We identified 30 malware families distributed by PrivateLoader.

item.title: Decrypting and Hunting PrivateLoader
item.description: The malware's uncommon string decryption technique enable us to write a Yara rule for detection and hunting purposes.

item.title: FluBot Persists: Infecting Europe and Australia
item.description: This Android banker commonly spreads via SMS messages to the contacts on an infected device.

item.title: Backdoors Pre-Installed on Cheap Android Devices
item.description: BitSight’s sinkhole data shows that Brazil is the most affected country, followed by Russia and India.

item.title: Fraudulent Ads SDK Installed On 15 Million Android Devices
item.description: By using these SDKs, app developers are often unknowingly placing their users at risk and facilitating advertising fraud.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello there! My name is André, I’m based in Portugal and currently a Senior Cyber Threat Intelligence Researcher at BitSight, tracking malware botnets through open-source intelligence, malware analysis and reverse engineering. Abuse.ch contributions (OSINT): https://urlhaus.abuse.ch/user/2726/ https://yaraify.abuse.ch/user/6993/ https://bazaar.abuse.ch/user/1024/ https://threatfox.abuse.ch/user/22597/
